name: Authentic Chino Glide Pro Pants - Men's

features: Cotton/Nylon Fabric - 58% cotton, 42% nylon 9 oz. double weave fabrication creates a classic workwear look with a smooth interior for added mobility
Shoelace Belt - Removable, hidden internal belt provides a locked-in fit
Crotch Gusset - Provides added durability and resists blowouts
Secure Front Pockets - Elastic gusset and internal stitch keep contents secure
Satin Pockets - Lightweight construction for maximum comfort
